body:
There are two types of license plans available to the users of HackerRank for Work:

Development License: A development license is meant for a software developer or a technical manager. A user with a development license can create and edit questions, tests, and reports. If the user has availed an enterprise plan, then they can use CodePair to create and conduct interviews.

However, the users with a development license cannot send test invites to the candidates.

Note: Any of these permissions can be disabled by the Admin by editing the user permissions if required.

Recruitment license: A recruitment license is meant for a recruiter. The recruitment license holder has the full access to the platform. The recruiters can create and edit tests, questions, and reports. They can send invites to the candidates. If the user is part of the enterprise plan, then they can use CodePair to create and conduct interviews.

There are three plans for the license and the number of users you can add depends on the plan you are using.

Plan

Upper limit on the number of users

Pricing

Trial Plan

30 users (development + recruiter licenses)

Free plan for 14 days

Enterprise Plan

Depends on the number of licenses purchased

Contact sales@hackerrank.com for price

Â
title: Types of licenses
